name: Catenae-dev
tagline: A machine-corrected version of the Catenae Graecorum Patrum in Novum Testamentum.
body:
#Welcome to **catenae-dev**!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of the _Catenae Graecorum Patrum in Novum Testamentum_.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [DDD](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded each volume of the _Catenae_ in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards.
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Volumes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
